nodes.text: Dara Nadal was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. A member of the Knights of Zakuul, she was stationed on the Eternal Flagship of Emperor Arcann in 3630 BBY. When the Emperor received from SCORPIO the location of the Anti-Zakuul Alliance base of Odessen, he took the flagship and a sizeable portion of the Eternal Fleet there. In the ensuing Battle of Odessen, the flagship was boarded by the Alliance forces. Dara Nadal encountered and engaged Lana Beniko and the Alliance Commander, but was defeated and killed.
Dara Nadal appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 16: The Battle of Odessen.
